java/liquibase/database/sql/DropDefaultValueStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.*;
00004 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00005 
00006 public class DropDefaultValueStatement implements SqlStatement {
00007 
00008     private String schemaName;
00009     private String tableName;
00010     private String columnName;
00011 
00012     public DropDefaultValueStatement(String schemaName, String tableName, String columnName) {
00013         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00014         this.tableName = tableName;
00015         this.columnName = columnName;
00016     }
00017 
00018     public String getSchemaName() {
00019         return schemaName;
00020     }
00021 
00022     public String getTableName() {
00023         return tableName;
00024     }
00025 
00026     public String getColumnName() {
00027         return columnName;
00028     }
00029 
00030     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00031         if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase) {
00032 //smarter drop        return new SqlStatement[]{new RawSqlStatement("ALTER TABLE " + SqlUtil.escapeTableName(getTableName(), database) + " DROP CONSTRAINT select d.name from syscolumns c,sysobjects d, sysobjects t where c.id=t.id AND d.parent_obj=t.id AND d.type='D' AND t.type='U' AND c.name='"+getColumnName()+"' AND t.name='"+getTableName()+"'"),};
00033             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " DROP CONSTRAINT " + ((MSSQLDatabase) database).generateDefaultConstraintName(getTableName(), getColumnName());
00034         } else if (database instanceof MySQLDatabase) {
00035             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " ALTER " + getColumnName() + " DROP DEFAULT";
00036         } else if (database instanceof OracleDatabase) {
00037             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " MODIFY " + getColumnName() + " DEFAULT NULL";
00038         } else if (database instanceof DerbyDatabase) {
00039             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " ALTER COLUMN  " + getColumnName() + " WITH DEFAULT NULL";
00040         } else if (database instanceof MaxDBDatabase) {
00041                 return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " COLUMN  " + getColumnName() + " DROP DEFAULT";
00042         }
00043 
00044         return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " ALTER COLUMN  " + getColumnName() + " SET DEFAULT NULL";
00045     }
00046 
00047     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00048         return ";";
00049     }
00050 
00051     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00052         return true;
00053     }
00054 }
